Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Rick L. Reber "The Reeb"
Reviews.Content: Good deal for good TV you can find for 250$$ or so with rewards and Kohls cash too!!! ould recommend for nice TV

ProductInfo.Features:
Television Features: Parental Control, High Contrast and Brightness, Digital Noise Filter, Sleep Timer, Digital Combo Filter
Display Features: HD Display, Channel Display, Backlit LED, Closed Caption, English Language On-Screen Display
Audio Features: Dolby Digital, Digital Noise Reduction
Slim Bezel Design Thinner than a standard 39" LED, the slim design gets out of the way of your viewing experience
Comprehensive array of input ports 3 HDMI, 1 Component, 1 Composite and 1 VGA port provide ample connections
ProductInfo.Name: APEX 39" Class 1080p 60Hz DLED FHDTV with Slim Bezel - Black (LE3943)
